summary: If they were interesting, innovative and naturally funny enough they wouldn't have had to resort to clickbaiting (especially...
question: If they were interesting, innovative and naturally funny enough they wouldn't have had to resort to clickbaiting (especially with phan stuff to make the shippers drool). Maybe if their upload schedule wasn't so bad, too. That title is just a bit awkward lol
answer:
I mean, realistically I think we all knew they weren’t actually gonna strip down. I’ll accept avatar nudity as “Dan and Phil fighting in their underwear”

I’m just a bit sad they actually put on the clothes they found instead of keeping the undies joke going.

So my opinion of the clickbait is “it’s mildly clickbait, but not offensively clickbait.”

As for all your shit about them not being creative or innovative or whatever, I’m gonna chalk this one up to the fact that they filmed this at the tail end of a world tour so we can probably forgive them for making easy content a bit more infrequently. (And the gaming videos have actually been pretty consistent compared to their main channels so)

I agree the title was weird. The video was weird. But it’s not really anything to be mad at.

blog.name: heavydirtyphandom
blog.title: fetus phan is my trigger
blog.description: I could take take the high road but I know that I'm going low

summary: Here we are! The last official show is done and Dnp are back in London. Until the tbc dates...the tour is over. It's been three...
body:
Here we are! The last official show is done and Dnp are back in London. Until the tbc dates…the tour is over. It’s been three months since my show in Berlin and it’s still not real to me. Time went so fast since I’d gotten the tickets and suddenly it was the actual day of the show and next thing I know is that it was over. It was definitely the best day of my life. Full of happiness and joy. I will always love them so much, the biggest reason being the happiness and good times they have given me and the memories that I will always hold on to.

When I close my eyes, I still see them standing on the stage in front of me. I still see them smiling and I hear them talking but my brain can’t comprehend these pictures, these memories which makes the whole situation pretty hard for me. But what I hold on to are the emotions that I’d felt during the day until the show started and how I felt during the interval when I was getting my Sprite and Muse was playing and of course how I felt when they were finally on stage and when they left and all of these things are memories connected with feelings and all I understand at the moment are the feelings, if that makes any sense. But they are good. They are the best I can think of. Only the emotions I feel on concerts can compare to that.

@danielhowell @amazingphil thank you for giving me the most fun I’d ever had. I will tell my children and grandchildren about June 9th 2018, Interactive Introverts Berlin.
